QuestData.Title: A Grim Harvest
QuestData.Description: The larger monsters are the key to my destiny, I can feel it. The pods growing on them are even bigger than the one you brought me earlier. Get me a few of these, they will be... helpful... soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Grulkor $1oa Spore Pods from the Fungal Stompers.
QuestData.RewardText: These will aid me greatly. I must consume them and take their power. We are close to the end $p, I can feel it.
